alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Pike; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:49PM EDT until July 24 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE...WESTERN SULLIVAN...SOUTHEASTERN LACKAWANNA...WAYNE AND NORTHWESTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 648 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Peabrook to Honesdale to White Haven, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Honesdale, Hawley and Bethany around 655 PM EDT. Narrowsburg around 700 PM EDT. Jeffersonville, Lava and Roscoe around 705 PM EDT. Lackawaxen and Hazel around 710 PM EDT. Eldred, Livingston Manor and White Sulphur Springs around 715 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
